Uses of Package
eu.mondo.mondix.core

  • Packages that use eu.mondo.mondix.core 
    Package Description
    eu.mondo.mondix.core  
    eu.mondo.mondix.implementation.hashmap  
    eu.mondo.mondix.implementation.hashmap.database  
    eu.mondo.mondix.implementation.hashmap.live  
    eu.mondo.mondix.live  
  • Classes in eu.mondo.mondix.core used by eu.mondo.mondix.core 
    Class and Description
    IMondixInstance
    A Mondix indexer that publishes a number of base relations (IMondixRelation).
    IMondixRelation
    Represents a base relation for which queries can be opened.
    IQueryInstance
    A query with potential parameter substitutions (seed).
    IQueryInstanceDirect.RowInterpreter
    An adapter object to interpret the internal row representation of a IQueryInstanceDirect.
    IUnaryQueryInstance
    Special case of IQueryInstance where the number of selected columns is known to be 1.
  • Classes in eu.mondo.mondix.core used by eu.mondo.mondix.implementation.hashmap 
    Class and Description
    IMondixInstance
    A Mondix indexer that publishes a number of base relations (IMondixRelation).
    IMondixRelation
    Represents a base relation for which queries can be opened.
    INullaryQueryInstance
    Special case of IQueryInstance where the number of selected columns is known to be 0.
    IQueryInstance
    A query with potential parameter substitutions (seed).
    IUnaryQueryInstance
    Special case of IQueryInstance where the number of selected columns is known to be 1.
  • Classes in eu.mondo.mondix.core used by eu.mondo.mondix.implementation.hashmap.database 
    Class and Description
    IMondixInstance
    A Mondix indexer that publishes a number of base relations (IMondixRelation).
  • Classes in eu.mondo.mondix.core used by eu.mondo.mondix.implementation.hashmap.live 
    Class and Description
    IMondixInstance
    A Mondix indexer that publishes a number of base relations (IMondixRelation).
    IMondixRelation
    Represents a base relation for which queries can be opened.
    INullaryQueryInstance
    Special case of IQueryInstance where the number of selected columns is known to be 0.
    IQueryInstance

    IUnaryQueryInstance
    Special case of IQueryInstance where the number of selected columns is known to be 1.
  • Classes in eu.mondo.mondix.core used by eu.mondo.mondix.live 
    Class and Description
    IMondixInstance
    A Mondix indexer that publishes a number of base relations (IMondixRelation).
    IMondixRelation
    Represents a base relation for which queries can be opened.
    IQueryInstance
    A query with potential parameter substitutions (seed).
    IQueryInstanceDirect
    A specialized version of IQueryInstance that offers direct access to the internal memory representation of the indexer to avoid copying result tuples into the standard format.
